item.title: How to use GoogleScript
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Useful Examples Send email from spreadsheet data function sendMailByRowNo(rowNo){ // rowString e.g. 1:1 var rowString = Utilities.formatString("%s:%s", rowNo, rowNo) var values = spreadsheet.getRange(rowString).getValues()[0] sendMailByValues(values) } function convertValuesToObject(values) { var obj = {}; obj.timestamp = values[0] obj.email = values[1] obj.title = values[2] return obj } function sendMailByValues(values) { var obj = convertValuesToObject(values) Logger.log(obj) var htmlBody = setEmailBody(obj) var mailAppObject = { to: obj.email, subject: obj.title, htmlBody: htmlBody } // an example to attach a pdf file in google drive // var attachements = DriveApp.
